title: The.Alphabet.Killer.2008.ENG.AAC.iTA.AC3.BrRiP.720p.x264-Tr_TdTe
description:
The video from this is original from this torrent:

The.Alphabet.Killer.2008.iTA_AC3.ENG_DTS.BrRiP.720p.x264-Tr_TdTeaM

magnet:?xt=urn:btih:BIMERKSUSUL4NPL3EW5EROENTMP74EGH


Too bad the 6Ch eng dts track in there is out of sync.  It is synced at beginning but get progressively unsynced as time goes on.  A simple fixed time delay will not help.  If anyone knows better, please download that original one and resync and maybe also reencode the dts to ac3 to reduce size and repost since it would be nice to have 6ch 720p for this movie

In the meantime, I incorporated the 2 ch eng sound from The.Alphabet.Killer.LIMITED.DVDRip.XviD-NeDiVx with perfect sync.  Ital ac3 2 ch left in as that was good.



Please keep seeding as this is probably the only good 720p ver of this movie on torrent right now.  Thanks.
